projects.title: ZIP URL - Full Stack URL Shortener
projects.bodyText: - ZIP URL is a full-stack URL shortener project utilizing React JS for the front end, Python Flask for back end logic, and Firebase for data storage. Hosted on Heroku, it efficiently shortens and redirects URLs, managing 2,500+ URLs for 200+ active users with seamless functionality.

projects.title: HB
projects.bodyText: - The HB application, developed under my leadership with a team of six, is a comprehensive Hospital Database. It optimizes MySQL tables to securely manage over 10,000 patient records and appointments. With user login features for Doctors, Patients, and Administrators, it ensures robust security and efficient healthcare data management.

projects.title: Geek Text
projects.bodyText: - Geek Text, an online bookstore application built with the MERN stack, features a Profile Management system. Led by me with a team of five developers, it securely manages logins, personal info, payment details, and addresses. Stringent password standards and data validation enhance security for 300+ users.

projects.title: Weather Explorer
projects.bodyText: - Weather Explorer is a weather forecast application developed with real-time data fetching and an interactive UI. It provides accurate weather updates by integrating RESTful APIs, serving over 200 users. The application was refined through user testing, iteratively improving its usability based on feedback to enhance the overall user experience.

projects.title: SkyPulse
projects.bodyText: - SkyPulse is a flight review application developed with Ruby, JavaScript, and HTML, designed to help users share and explore airline experiences. It allows users to submit detailed flight reviews, rate airlines, and view feedback from other travelers. SkyPulse leverages dynamic front-end features for a smooth user experience and incorporates RESTful architecture for efficient data handling.
